mode.label: Select Question Type
mode.generalDescription: Practice with commonly asked interview questions

background.label: Background
background.placeholder: Enter your work history and experience

position.label: Target Position
position.placeholder: Enter the position and industry you're applying for

confirm.title: End Interview?
confirm.message: To check the results of past interviews, please press "End Interview".

complete.title: Interview Complete
complete.message: The interview session has ended. Would you like to review your feedback?

feedback.title: Results
feedback.subtitle: Review your performance and get personalized feedback to improve your interview skills.
feedback.pricingNotice: The following are the plans and features we are currently considering. Pricing and additional features for each plan will be determined in the future.

vocabulary.title: Vocabulary
vocabulary.description: Accuracy in selecting and using industry-specific terms and contextually appropriate vocabulary

grammar.title: Grammar
grammar.description: Accuracy in tenses, subject-verb agreement, and use of prepositions and articles

structure.title: Structure
structure.description: Logical organization of responses based on STAR/CAR format

logic.title: Quantitative Evidence
logic.description: Presentation of achievements with specific numbers and percentages

feedback.question: Question {{number}}
feedback.premiumFeatureNotice: Upgrade to access all feedback details

hero.title: Master Your English Interview Skills with AI
hero.subtitle: Practice interviews anytime, anywhere with our AI-powered platform to improve your English and interview skills.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Comprehensive evaluation and feedback for effective interview preparation

anytime.title: Practice Anytime, Anywhere
anytime.description: Available 24/7, practice as many times as you want with no limitations

evaluation.title: English & Interview Skills
evaluation.description: AI evaluates pronunciation, grammar, vocabulary, and response quality with detailed feedback

personalized.title: Personalized Learning
personalized.description: Questions tailored to your experience and target industry, with analysis of past practice data

learning.title: Learning Process
learning.subtitle: Three simple steps to improve your interview skills

step1.title: Start Interview Practice
step1.description: One-on-one practice with AI in a realistic interview environment

step2.title: Detailed Feedback
step2.description: Comprehensive evaluation of both English and interview performance

step3.title: Continuous Improvement
step3.description: Target your weaknesses and practice repeatedly to improve skills
